mapper.select: select * from activity_log where to_email = #{email} and rownum <= 30

select seq_photo, kind, readyn, a.nickname to_nickname, b.nickname from_nickname, b.email from_email, b.profile from_profile from activity_log, member a, member b where activity_log.to_email = #{email} and a.email = activity_log.to_email and activity_log.from_email = b.email order by activity_log.reg_date desc
